Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Marina Way, just west of the Regalia Convent.
Room.LongDescription: To the east, you can see the great Regalia Convent. Although most of their teachings are considered blasphemous, many scholars and other thinking persons find some amusement in their existance. The entrance to the Convent is located to the east. The Convent caters exclusively to women and teaches a monotheistic philosophy.
